text: Delivering Trusted Control Solutions for over 25 years 19770 Bahama St. Northridge, CA 91324 V: 818.898.3380 F: 818.898.3360 sales@dnfcontrols.com www.dnfcontrols.com Everything’s Under Control DNF Controls offers a comprehensive eco-system of products and technologies to create single-user to enterprise-wide control solutions that easily adapt and scale as required. Take your show on the road with the AIB-4 AnyWhere Interface Box Cut shows remotely from your home facility. Transport GPIs and On-Air Tallies into the field, wherever you need them – across cities, states, even continents. Make the connection: – Over IP – Over Audio and Intercom lines using DTMF – Over Dial-up Modem when only POTS is available The AIB-4 makes it easy to connect it all:  16 GPIs with Opto-Isolated Inputs  16 GPI Outputs with Isolated Relay Contact Closures  100 Mbs Full Duplex IP Connectivity  DTMF Transmit and Receive: Single and Multi-digit Sequences  Telecom approved Dial-up Data Modem  Redundant Power Supplies  Web-browser Setup, Configuration and Diagnostics keep things easy and simple.
